etl.query:
SELECT a.uuid AS uuid_key, aHostingOrg.uuid AS organization_key, CASE a.category WHEN 20000 THEN 'DIGIR_INSTALLATION' WHEN 20010 THEN 'TAPIR_INSTALLATION' WHEN 20020 THEN 'BIOCASE_INSTALLATION' WHEN 20030 THEN 'IPT_INSTALLATION' WHEN 20040 THEN 'HTTP_INSTALLATION' END AS type, a.name AS title, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.description))<10 THEN null ELSE a.description END AS description, COALESCE(a.created, a.modified, now()) AS created, COALESCE(a.modified, a.created, now()) AS modified, a.deleted, 'ADMIN' AS created_by, 'ADMIN' AS modified_by FROM agent a JOIN agent_relation arHostingOrg ON a.id=arHostingOrg.to_agent_id JOIN agent aHostingOrg ON aHostingOrg.id=arHostingOrg.from_agent_id WHERE a.type=14100 AND arHostingOrg.relation_type_id=15040 AND arHostingOrg.deleted IS NULL AND aHostingOrg.type=14010
INSERT INTO installation(key,organization_key, type,title,description,created,modified,deleted,created_by,modified_by) VALUES(?uuid_key::uuid,?organization_key::uuid, ?type::enum_installation_type,?title,?description, ?created,?modified,?deleted,?created_by,?modified_by);
